forum.name: T3D2 Discussion: Sharing Your Ideas for Succeeding at Standardized Tests
forum.intro:
Share ideas relating to How to Do Your Best on Standardized Tests: Some Suggestions for Adult Learners.

Based on your reading, please share:

  • Your favorite or most effective method for assisting adult learners to succeed on standardized assessments. Be sure to give enough detail so that others could try it out themselves.
  • If you don’t feel you have any strategies to share, post an idea from the reading that you might like to try with your learners and why/how you think it will help them succeed.

After you post, please take time to review others’ posted responses and post at least one reply in response.

Once You Have Completed Your Post:

Click on Intro-Assessment-ABE link at the top (or at left under "my Courses") to return to the Course Outline and access the next course activity.
